channel.title: Basketball_sims on Will Hipson
channel.description: Recent content in Basketball_sims on Will Hipson

item.title: Simulating Emotions during a Basketball Game - Just a Feeling in the Crowd
item.description: Sporting events host witness to a wide range of human emotion. The emotional ups and downs are especially clear among invested fans. Fans experience the joy and excitement of a triumphant comeback, or the anxiety and disappointment of a loss. It is particularly interesting to see how emotions differ from two opposing fan groups watching the same match. I decided to perform some simulations on how a crowd of fans would react during a basketball game.
